casebody.data:
STATE
v.
WILSON. No. COA07-255. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed November 6, 2007. Certification Date November 26, 2007. Appeal from Iredell (05CRS53798, 05CRS53799, 05CRS14444).

Cases Reported Without Published Opinion. DISMISSED as to the assignments of error pertaining to the dismissal of defendant's motion to suppress. NO ERROR as to the trial.
